DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select §§n P.ProductCode,§§n P.ProductName,§§n ProductStatus.ItemName as ProductStatus,§§n ProductType.ItemName as ProductType,§§n DT_POS.DocTemplateName as POS_MediaTemplate,§§n C.RecursiveName as Category,§§n PG.TagName as PrintGroup,§§n FG.TagName as FinanceGroup,§§n AG.TagName as AdmissionGroup,§§n RG.TagName as AreaGroup,§§n Stuff((§§n select ', ' + TagName§§n from§§n tbTagLink TL inner join§§n tbTag T on T.TagId=TL.TagId§§n where TL.EntityId=P.ProductId§§n order by T.TagName§§n FOR XML PATH('')§§n ), 1, 1, '') as Tags,§§n Stuff((§§n select ', ' + AttributeItemName§§n from§§n tbProduct2AttributeItem P2AI left join§§n tbAttributeItem AI on AI.AttributeItemId=P2AI.AttributeItemId left join§§n tbAttribute A on A.AttributeId=AI.AttributeId§§n where§§n P2AI.ProductId=P.ProductId§§n order by§§n A.AttributeWeight,§§n AI.AttributeItemName§§n FOR XML PATH('')§§n ), 1, 1, '') as Attributes,§§n Stuff((§§n select ', ' + §§n Coalesce(XSC.SaleChannelCode, 'default') + '/' + §§n Coalesce(XPT.PerformanceTypeCode, 'default') + '/' +§§n (case when XPP.PriceActionType=3 and XPP.PriceValueType=1 then Cast(XPP.PriceValue as varchar(max)) else 'calc' end)§§n from §§n tbProductPriceDate XPPD left join§§n tbProductPrice XPP on XPPD.ProductPriceDateId=XPP.ProductPriceDateId left join§§n tbSaleChannel XSC on XSC.SaleChannelId=XPP.SaleChannelId left join§§n tbPerformanceType XPT on XPT.PerformanceTypeId=XPP.PerformanceTypeId§§n where §§n XPPD.ProductId=P.ProductId and§§n not(XPP.SaleChannelId is null and XPP.PerformanceTypeId is null)§§n FOR XML PATH('')§§n ), 1, 1, '') as SC_PT_Price,§§n Stuff(( §§n select '|' + LRT.LedgerRuleTemplateName§§n from§§n tbLedgerRuleTemplate2Entity LRT2E inner join§§n tbLedgerRuleTemplate LRT on LRT.LedgerRuleTemplateId=LRT2E.LedgerRuleTemplateId§§n where §§n LRT2E.EntityId=P.ProductId§§n order by§§n LRT.LedgerRuleTemplateName§§n FOR XML PATH('')§§n ), 1, 1, '') as [LedgerProfiles],§§n Stuff(( §§n select ',' + CA.CodeAlias§§n from§§n tbCodeAlias CA§§n where §§n CA.EntityId=P.ProductId§§n FOR XML PATH('')§§n ), 1, 1, '') as [CodeAlias]§§nfrom §§n tbProduct P left join§§n tbLookupItem ProductStatus on ProductStatus.ItemCode=P.ProductStatus and ProductStatus.TableCode=49 left join§§n tbLookupItem ProductType on ProductType.ItemCode=P.ProductType and ProductType.TableCode=18 left join§§n tbCategory C on C.CategoryId=P.CategoryId left join§§n tbTag PG on PG.TagId=P.PrintGroupTagId left join§§n tbTag FG on FG.TagId=P.FinanceGroupTagId left join§§n tbTag AG on AG.TagId=P.AdmGroupTagId left join§§n tbTag RG on RG.TagId=P.AreaGroupTagId left join§§n tbProduct2DocTemplate P2DT_POS on P2DT_POS.ProductId=P.ProductId and P2DT_POS.ProductTemplateType=1 left join§§n tbDocTemplate DT_POS on DT_POS.DocTemplateId=P2DT_POS.DocTemplateId§§nwhere§§n P.ProductType <> 2
